title: 有没有人帮我看看SRV严重错误是什么问题
author: 控控
txt_content: 10.12 19:36:44 [服务器] 信息 [FML]: SRV 严重错误: (manor_A0 at 75/69/-336/2/0/1988457371/Sept-Freres-les-patures/WorldServer{Name=world, DimensionId=0, DimensionType=minecraft:overworld, DimensionTypeId=0}): Error when trying to recreate a villager from record Ingvald Elfride/merchant/8757107489562274108: couldn't load house at 83/69/-333.10.12 19:36:43 [服务器] 位置: org.millenaire.common.village.Building$SaveWorker.run(Building.java:386)10.12 19:36:43 [服务器] 位置: java.nio.file.Files.move(Files.java:1395)10.12 19:36:43 [服务器] Thread-5738/信息 [FML]: SRV java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException: ./world/millenaire/buildings/714_70_-1449_temp.gz -> ./world/millenaire/buildings/714_70_-1449.gz10.12 19:36:43 [服务器] Thread-5738/信息 [FML]: SRV Exception, printing stack:

replies.author: 星耀幻影
replies.txt_content: 删除world文件夹或清空world的区块，区块加载错误
